title: Best of The Herd: 03/27/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/27/2019
description:
Colin proclaims that the NFL making rule changes to pass interference will only create more problems, recent rumors about the Lakers interest in Rick was obviously leaked to keep them in the news cycle, trading LeBron James for Zion wouldn't be that tough, and congratulates to the Milwaukee Bucks on replacing the Raptors as the Eastern Conference team to dominate the regular season but get bounced from the playoffs.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
